hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said (that Allah said), "Vowing does not bring to the son of Adam anything I have not already written in his fate, but vowing is imposed on him by way of fore ordainment. Through vowing I make a miser spend of his wealth

chapter.ara-name: باب إِلْقَاءِ النَّذْرِ الْعَبْدَ إِلَى الْقَدَرِ
chapter.eng-name: Man makes a vow seeking something other than what has been preordained
